subject: Amazon order
description_text: I ordered your Pro X Ultra pedals and VAM pro haptics off of Amazon. I initially had a tracking number that I could use to track both things. But now Amazon is not showing me any information about tracking. Could you help me with this. It says it was shipped by Simsonn themselves.

conversations.body_text: Hi Christian Holehouse,    Yes, they can be used together, but you will need a new control box. You can purchase a Plus X control box and note that you need a Pro X Ultra control box, and we will modify your order for you.
Hi Christian Holehouse,    What type of pedal are you using? If you're using our new pedal, you won't need to purchase a separate control box. Otherwise, a separate control box is required.

I plan on purchasing your pro x ultra pedal set. 

>
Hi Christian Holehouse,    Then you won't need to purchase an additional control box, as the pedal set includes a control box that supports haptics.

Hi Christian Holehouse,    As we are currently on the National Day holiday (until October 9th), our responses may be slower than usual. Once our operations team receives the latest logistics update, we will get back to you immediately.

I received the haptic vibrators today but not the pedals. Tracking is showing the same tracking for both products but I only received the one. 

>
ID 号为 2449 和 4135 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单2449  
      主题:   
      描述:  Is the “Pro X Pedal Upgrade New Simsonn Pedals for Racing Simulator” compatible with the VAM Pro haptic vibrator?

合并来自工单4135  
      主题:   
      描述:  Does the control box that comes with the Pro X Ultra come with the inputs for the VAM pro haptic pedals or do I need to order a separate control box the haptics. Thanks
Hi Christian Holehouse,  Please provide your Amazon order number, and I will ask our operations team to check the details for you.

Hi Christian Holehouse,      Hi, your order 111-8285776-4345014 from SIMSONN was sent out in 2 packages. The tracking number for the PRO X Ultra Pedals is 884729351068 (the shipping carrier is FedEx, you can track it via https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack, it was delivered on 2025-10-08 ), and the tracking number for the Haptic Reactor is: SF6045936171062 ( the shipping carrier is SF Express, you can track it via https://www.sf-international.com/cn/en/support/querySupport/waybill, it was delivered on 2025-10-06)
